item.title: MECO tools
item.description: Here come the MECO tools (mixedHinfsyn, mixedFixedOrder, …)

item.title: SDP solvers
item.description: Since LCToolbox nearly always reformulates a controller synthesis problems as a semidefinite program (SDP), you will need an appropriate solver for this. MATLAB’s Robust Control Toolbox offers ‘LMI Lab’. However, for some problem types it might be convenient to use more flexible solvers. LCToolbox formulates (nearly) all SDPs through YALMIP and thus supports all solvers that YALMIP interfaces. A complete list can be found here.

item.title: About
item.description: Purpose LCToolbox is an open-source linear control toolbox for MATLAB facilitating robust linear feedback controller design. Its main goal is to shield end users (control engineers) from tedious and time-consuming pre- and postprocessing steps that are typically involved in modern controller synthesis (based on H∞ and H2 norms). Both linear time-invariant (LTI) and linear parameter-dependent models are supported. The toolbox is, however, not restricted to control design, but strives for being a helpful tool in the entire design procedure of a linear controller.
